pages.text: Roughly Enough Items (REI) is a block, item, and recipe viewing mod. This is an older video but what he shows is still relevant: $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CpAYgn9ImuM)$(br)REI Showcase$(/l)$(br2)$(l)
For more information visit $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/roughly-enough-items)Roughly Enough Items$(/l) on CurseForge.
